name: Pool
description: A generic class for managing a pool of items.

methods.name: prepopulate
methods.description: Prepopulates the pool with a given number of items.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Gets an item from the pool. Calls the item's `init` method if it exists. If there are no items left in the pool, a new one will be created.

methods.name: return
methods.description: Returns an item to the pool. Calls the item's `reset` method if it exists.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Gets the number of items in the pool. / get totalSize(): number { return this._count; } /** Gets the number of items in the pool that are free to use without needing to create more. / get totalFree(): number { return this._index; } /** Gets the number of items in the pool that are currently in use. / get totalUsed(): number { return this._count - this._index; } /** clears the pool

properties.name: totalSize
properties.description: Gets the number of items in the pool.

properties.name: totalFree
properties.description: Gets the number of items in the pool that are free to use without needing to create more.

properties.name: totalUsed
properties.description: Gets the number of items in the pool that are currently in use.
